title: Social Engagement Activities – Family-Involved Activities to Boost Connection
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to facilitate family-involved activities for my socially isolated patients so that they can maintain connections with loved ones and improve their emotional well-being.

title: Holistic Health Alerts for Caregivers
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to receive alerts on holistic health trends of my patients so that I can monitor their well-being and provide timely interventions, especially for those who are socially isolated.

title: User-Centric Learning Resources – Guidelines for Caregivers on Promoting Engagement
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want access to guidelines on promoting engagement for my patients so that I can effectively support their emotional wellbeing and social needs, particularly for those who are socially isolated.
